__e: This really isn't working, one of us always being here, minding the baby.
Always so busy with work and the family.
You have been so busy with the wedding, I haven't even seen you.
You have been so busy with the wedding, I haven't even seen you.
All he wants to do is spend time with his kid, but now the kid's busy with his own family, and, uh... he just can't find the time.
Yeah, I'm kind of in the middle of something here, you know?
I didn't do anything, and I'm busy right now.
Well, I'm kind of in the middle of something right now, so can I come over later?
You've been taking care of everybody since you've been here.
I've been dealing with this whole thing incredibly poorly.
You talk like I know any of this. The reason you don't know any is because I took care of it for you.
Thank you for taking care of me for such a long time.
Why now? Why do you have to go now? He needs me.
It's been so long since someone's really taken care of me.
You gonna tell him I took care of you?
No, stay with us, I can't look... I've never looked after someone before.
I ain't been looking after you for you to go out this way.
I've been so busy trying to give her everything she wants, when all she really wants is to take care of me.
Because you blame yourself for what happened to dad, because I was too busy trying to help you, not him,
I was kinda busy with the whole trying not to get us killed thing.
I can't hear you because I'm too - busy doing what I'm told.
Everybody else was busy doing other things, so I had time to stop by and check on the house, so...
Nah. I'm sure he's probably busy doing something right now.
Everybody else was busy doing other things, so I had time to stop by and check on the house, so...
We're too busy thinking about what happens next... or what didn't happen at all.
He doesn't know what he wants, he's too busy thinking about what you want, and what you need.
I fear I've been too devoted to business these past few years.
Oh, I am so sorry you had so much estate business, sir.
You were probably too busy butting into people's business!
You know, he says his job keeps him really busy.
Is it because I've been too busy with work?
I know, I've been preoccupied with work.
I'm sorry, he's a little busy right now.
I'm a tad busy at the moment trying to kill everyone here.
No, I have it handled for now, but I can't leave it there forever.
No, I'm-I'm kind of busy right now.
I told him that you are in a meeting right now.
No, your dad's kind of busy right now.
You know I'm never too busy to talk to you.
No, I have it handled for now, but I can't leave it there forever.
Well, you said you were too busy for me not to be.
